questions.question: Choose the correct verb form to complete the sentence: 'By the time she arrives, we _____ our work.'
Which sentence correctly uses a modal verb to express possibility?
options: She must be at home now.
She will be at home now.
She can to be at home now.
She is be at home now.
questions.answer: She must be at home now.

questions.question: Choose the correct verb tense for this sentence: 'If he _____ harder, he would have passed the exam.'
Identify the sentence that uses the passive voice correctly:
options: The cake was baked by Mary.
questions.answer: The cake was baked by Mary.

questions.question: Choose the correct verb form: 'Not only _____ late, but he also forgot his homework.'
